{"id":1737973460,"question_id":3974,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3Â months","timestamp":1755399161,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"99 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1737973460/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"XOR After Range Multiplication Queries I","memory":"176 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int xorAfterQueries(vector<int>& nums, vector<vector<int>>& queries) {\n        vector<long long> num;\n        for (int i : nums)\n            num.push_back(1LL * i);\n        \n        const int MOD = 1e9+7;\n        for (auto q : queries) {\n            int l=q[0], r=q[1], k=q[2], v=q[3];\n            for (int i=l; i<=r; i+=k) {\n                num[i] = (num[i] * 1LL * v) % MOD;\n            }\n        }\n        int xo = num[0];\n        for (int i=1; i<(int)num.size(); i++)\n            xo ^= num[i];\n        return xo;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"xor-after-range-multiplication-queries-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1180}
